v-model.description: The selection, if it is a multi-column selector, should be of type Array
v-model.description_zh: 选中项，如果为多列选择器，则其类型应为数组

columns.description: Selector data, which can be an array of strings, an array of objects, or a multi-column selector if it is a two-dimensional array
columns.description_zh: 选择器数据，可以为字符串数组，也可以为对象数组，如果为二维数组，则为多列选择器

loading-color.description: Loaded colors can only be written in hexadecimal color values, and cannot use abbreviations
loading-color.description_zh: 加载的颜色，只能使用十六进制的色值写法，且不能使用缩写

columns-height.description: The picker inner drum is high

value-key.description: option object, the key corresponding to the value
value-key.description_zh: 选项对象中，value对应的 key

label-key.description: In the options object, the key corresponding to the displayed text
label-key.description_zh: 选项对象中，展示的文本对应的 key

display-format.description: Customize the formatting function of the display copy, which returns a string
display-format.description_zh: 自定义展示文案的格式化函数，返回一个字符串

column-change.description: Receive the pickerView instance, the selected item, the subscript of the currently modified column, and resolve as input parameters, and modify the data source of other columns through the setColumnData method exposed by the pickerView instance.
column-change.description_zh: 接收 pickerView 实例、选中项、当前修改列的下标、resolve 作为入参，根据选中项和列下标进行判断，通过 pickerView 实例暴露出来的 setColumnData 方法修改其他列的数据源。

label-width.description: Set the width of the header on the left

error.description: Whether it is in the error state, and the content on the right side is red when the error state is in the error state
error.description_zh: 是否为错误状态，错误状态时右侧内容为红色

align-right.description: The value of the selector is shown on the right

before-confirm.description: Before determining the checksum function, receive (value, resolve, picker) parameters, and continue to execute picker through resolve, resolve receives one boolean parameter
before-confirm.description_zh: 确定前校验函数，接收 (value, resolve, picker) 参数，通过 resolve 继续执行 picker，resolve 接收1个boolean参数

close-on-click-modal.description: Click whether the mask is off

safe-area-inset-bottom.description: Whether the pop-up panel sets the bottom safety distance (iPhone X type models)
safe-area-inset-bottom.description_zh: 弹出面板是否设置底部安全距离（iphone X 类型的机型）

ellipsis.description: Whether or not it is out of hiding

prop.description: The form field model field name, which is required if the form validation function is used
prop.description_zh: 表单域 model 字段名，在使用表单校验功能的情况下，该属性是必填的

rules.description: Form validation rules, which can be used in conjunction with the wd-form component
rules.description_zh: 表单验证规则，结合wd-form组件使用

immediate-change.description: Whether to trigger the picker-view change event immediately when the finger is released. If it is not enabled, the change event will be triggered after the end of the scrolling animation, which is available from version 1.2.25 onwards and is only supported by WeChat Mini Programs and Alipay Mini Programs.
immediate-change.description_zh: 是否在手指松开时立即触发picker-view的 change 事件。若不开启则会在滚动动画结束后触发 change 事件，1.2.25版本起提供，仅微信小程序和支付宝小程序支持。

events.name: confirm
events.description: Click the button on the right to trigger
events.params: event.detail = { value, selectedItems }， value 为选中值(多列则为数组)，selectedItems为选中项(多列则为数组)

events.name: cancel
events.description: Click the button on the left to trigger

events.name: open
events.description: Triggered when the selector pops up a layer
events.description_zh: 打开选择器弹出层时触发
